column4: hey peeps. is it just me but is everything in ubuntu huge.... I have changed my resolution but looking at my screen everything is so big. nothing is crisp... anyone have their ubuntu looking like good competition for windows?
sounds like you're running a flatpanel, but don't have Ubuntu set to run in your flatpanel's native display resolution
you have matched your flatpanel's native res (probably 1280x1024) with what Ubuntu is running for xorg.conf?
aside from something like font sizes or antialiasing, i'm afraid I don't know :(
